Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets gave up 109.6 points per game while committing 18.2 fouls last season.
Oklahoma City averaged 8.5 steals, 6.6 blocks and 11.8 turnovers per game last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver went 57-25 overall, 10-6 in Northwest Division action and 33-8 at home a season ago.
Oklahoma City went 57-25 overall, 12-4 in Northwest Division play and 24-17 on the road last season.
Others: Oklahoma City is first in the Western Conference with a 7-0 record, while Denver is eighth with a 3-3 record.
The current betting line has the Thunder -3.5 and an over/under of 222.
